ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package milk chocolate candy kisses
1 (1.69 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces

cookingTips: Place chocolate kiss on warm pretzel immediately after baking so it softens and adheres
Work quickly before pretzels cool or chocolate won't stick properly
Add candy-coated chocolate while chocolate is still warm for best adhesion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This no-bake assembly relies on timing and temperature. What's the ideal window for applying toppings to ensure they bond without melting completely?
